fulltext:
NGUYEN DUC QUY  
Date of birth  
 30/11/1993 
Contact address 
12.17 Flora Anh Dao Condominium - 623 Do Xuan Hop 
Street, District 9, Ho Chi Minh City, Viet Nam. 
Tel 
 (+84)355-940-569 
Email  
 ducquy.1993@gmail.com 
Skype  
 quy.nd.93 
LinkedIn Profile 
 https://www.linkedin.com/in/quy-nguyen-0211799a 
EXPERIENCES 
September 2017 - 
October 2018 
IPC Global Viet Nam -  Consultant 
▪ Do Qlik Sense Enterprise system sizing preparation, installation and 
administration. 
▪ Deploy on-demand applications (create data model, design dashboard, 
report…), offer information and make service suggestions based on a 
customer's needs. 
▪ Create documents for project development and training. 
▪ Conduct Qlik Sense training courses for analyzer user, professional 
user and administrator. 
▪ Maintain system and support customer after project deployment. 
Projects:   
▪ Qlik Analytic Platform – ACB Securities 
▪ Qlik Sense Enterprise - Japan Tobacco International 
▪ Qlik Sense Enterprise - Viettel Telecom 
▪ Qlik Sense Desktop - Cuong Lam Company 
POC:  Create POC applications for: Asia Commercial Bank, University Medical 
Center HCM, Vietnam International Commercial Joint-Stock Bank, An Binh 
Joint-Stock Bank, Viet Nam Government & Public Sector. 
April 2017 - 
September 2017 
Lac Viet Computing Corp. – BI Developer 
Project:  Qlik Sense – British American Tobacco 
▪ Maintain daily data loading in current Qlik Sense System 
▪ Optimize applications for tracking error, incremental data loading, 
improve user experience. 
▪ Recommend using Slow changing dimension for current data model, 
prepare for phase 2 of development.  
POC:  Create POC applications for: SaiGon HaNoi Bank, MB Bank Remittance, 
MediGroup VietNam. 
July 2016 - April 
2017 
NTT Data Viet Nam – Senior Software Programmer 
Project:  QlikView – Auchan Retail VietNam 
▪ Refactor existing QlikView applications, improve user experience on 
dashboard and reduce daily data loading time (up to 90%). 
▪ Create new applications for: Sales Statistics, Accounting, Vendors 
Rebate, Shrinkage Management. 
▪ Discuss new business requirements and make recommendations for 
customer. 
▪ Design report and schedule sending to management team on Qlik 
NPrinting. 
▪ Assist customers with technical support, maintenance, product design. 
April 2015  - July 
2016 
NTT Data Viet Nam – Software Programmer (Web) 
▪ Collaborated with a team of developers, designers, and project 
managers to carry out software development projects and create code 
for new modules. 
▪ Developed proper documentation for each module of product and 
revised new documentation when repairing lines of code. 
▪ Revised code to update capabilities, fix newly-found errors, and 
remove bugs. 
SKILLS 
Qlik Technology 3 years (Qlik View, Qlik Sense, Qlik Nprinting,  Qlik Analytic Platform) 
C# 2 years (Console, WinForm, MVC, ADO.Net, ASP.NET ) 
Java 1.5 years (Spring framework, Struts) 
Database 4 years (MS SQL, PosgreSQL, MySQL, Oracle) 
JavaScript 1.5 years (Jquery, AngularJS) 
  CERTIFICATIONS 
• Qlik Sense Business Analyst ( June 2017, June 2018 Release ) 
• Qlik Sense Data Architect ( June 2017, June 2018 Release ) 
• Qlik Sense Administrator ( June 2017 Release ) 
• QlikView 12 Business Analyst  
• QlikView 12 Data Architect 
EDUCATION 
• 2011-2015:     
 Ho Chi Minh University of Science (HCMUS) 
   Faculty of Information Technology 
LANGUAGE 
• English  :                        TOEIC 795 
• Japanese:  
              N5 
PERSONAL QUALITIES 
•    Out-going person, ambitious and want to do challenge work. 
•    Serious, punctual, responsible are my principles in working. 
•    Ready to learn and eager to share with everybody .
